title: Monitoring and Alerting Setup
description: Implement comprehensive monitoring with DataDog/New Relic, error tracking with Sentry, and alerting for production issues.
tasks: Set up DataDog or New Relic APM
Set up ELK stack or CloudWatch for logs
Set up PagerDuty for on-call alerts
Implement custom metrics for business KPIs
acceptanceCriteria: On-call team receives alerts within 1 minute
